title: Hour 2: Backcourt Beef?
description:
Stephen A, Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, Jeff Saturday and Marcus Spears talk Brian Kelly's tardy reporter comments, what teams will we see in the Super Bowl and who will be this year's Bengals?

itunes:subtitle: How are the Lakers backcourt going to co-exist?
